
## `r paste(.x,": ",.y)`

```{r}
isre24_track <- isre24_program_communications |>
  filter(PSSlot == .x) |>
  filter(Track == .y)
```

```{r}
isre24_track |>
  mutate(Time = paste(format(min(StartTime), format = "%H:%M"), "-", format(max(EndTime), format = "%H:%M"))) |>
  select(Track, Type = TYPE, SessionTitle, Time, Room) |>
  distinct() |>
  t() |>
  as.data.frame() |>
  rownames_to_column() |>
  flextable() |> 
  delete_part(part = "header") |> 
  hline_top(part = "body", border = fp_border(width = 1)) |> 
  width(j = 1, 1, unit = "in") |> 
  width(j = 2, 5, unit = "in")
```

```{r, results='asis'}
isre24_track |>
  select(Title = Paper.Title, Time, Authors, Abstract) |>
  mutate(
    Title = glue::glue("**{Title}**"),
    Authors = glue::glue("**{Authors}**"),
    Abstract = str_replace_all(Abstract, "[\r\n]" , "")
  ) |> 
  mutate(` ` = "\\") |> 
  pivot_longer(everything()) |> 
  mutate(
    name = if_else(value != "\\", paste0(name, ":"), name),
    jump = "\\"
  ) |> 
  unite("line", 1:3, sep = " ")  |> 
  unlist() |> 
  cat(sep = "\n")
```
